description.value:
This greasy stick emits a stomach-churning scent when held in a hand.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell]

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Arrow] at 8th rank. A creature that takes initial acid damage from this spell become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}. Use your spell DC if the creatures attempts to recover from this sickness. This is an olfactory effect.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of Acid Arrow at 8th rank.
